title: Critical Missing Person Located - Linda Margarette Addison
body:
Prince George’s County, Maryland…The Prince George’s County Police Department has located critical missing 62-year-old Linda Margarette Addison.  Addison was located and returned to her family unharmed. For further information call the Prince George's County Police Department’s Press Information office at (301) 772-4710.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
